title: Scandia-doped zirconia for the electrochemical detection of hazardous dihydroxybenzene (DHB) isomers in water.

In this paper, modified yttria- and scandia-doped zirconium oxide were exploited for the development of an effective electrochemical sensor for the simultaneous detection of dihydroxy benzene (DHB) isomers, i.e. hydroquinone...
